system.note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Reduced sound and no muzzle flash, Awareness Tests to hear shots have -30, and can only be attempted at half normal distance. Can be combined with Stalker Bolt Rounds unusual ammo.

description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Accurate, Tearing

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Reduced sound and no muzzle flash, Awareness Tests to hear shots have -30, and can only be attempted at half normal distance. Can be combined with Stalker Bolt Rounds unusual ammo.
